positive.explanation: Consultants effectively maintain enrollment momentum through clear leadership and ownership of requirements
positive.explanation1: Strong demonstration of deadline urgency transformation into immediate action with structured guidance
positive.explanation2: Effective acknowledgment of educational backgrounds builds confidence through qualification recognition

improvement.explanation: Enhanced focus needed on obtaining explicit verbal agreements and confirmed enrollment dates
improvement.explanation1: More assertive guidance required in managing student research phase with specific timelines
improvement.explanation2: Stronger emphasis needed on building academic confidence through specific success stories

conversations.title: Effective Timeline Urgency
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: Our enrollments are closing at the end of this week for our March intake and there isn't another one for a few months
conversations.student_response: I haven't studied for 15 years - I'm worried I won't be able to keep up
conversations.consultant_adaptation: CERT 4s can get you entry...we're starting our next teaching period starting the 10th of March
conversations.recommended_improvement: Include specific numbers of remaining spaces and concrete examples of students who benefited from early enrollment

goal_setting.title: Effective Timeline Urgency
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant created urgency but didn't secure immediate commitment
goal_setting.student_response: The student expressed study confidence concerns
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: The consultant validated qualifications but missed opportunity for immediate action
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have used deadline urgency to secure immediate enrollment while addressing confidence concerns
